text: Broadleaf may refer to: * Broad-leaved tree **Broadleaf forest * In agronomy, a term described in contrast to Poaceae. That is to say that broadleaf plants are not grasses: ** Broadleaf weed ** Broadleaf crop * A member of Magnoliopsida, informal term ==Related pages== * Eucalyptus dives, also known as the broad-leaf peppermint
title: Broadleaf
